description: This Kotlin source file defines a SearchFragment class for an Android TV application. The fragment provides search functionality for recipes, displaying results in a grid and handling user interactions such as clicking on a recipe to view details.

classes.name: SearchFragment
classes.description: A fragment for searching recipes, providing a search bar and displaying results in a grid layout.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the search fragment, sets up the adapter, and click listener for recipe items.

methods.name: getResultsAdapter
methods.description: Returns the adapter containing search results.

methods.name: onQueryTextChange
methods.description: Handles changes in the search query, triggers loading of filtered recipes.

methods.name: onQueryTextSubmit
methods.description: Handles submission of the search query, triggers loading of filtered recipes.

methods.name: loadQuery
methods.description: Filters recipes based on the search query and updates the display.
